sentences.en: All - consuming, competitive spirit meets rampant insecurity.
sentences.cn: 你很有斗争, 开拓精神,但确很缺乏安全感.

sentences.en: Cantaloup is belonged to cucurbitaceous, a year of rampant herb.
sentences.cn: 香瓜属葫芦科, 一年蔓生草本植物.

sentences.en: Crime and lawlessness are rampant as never before in our history.
sentences.cn: 犯罪和违法行为之猖獗是我国历史上前所未有的.

sentences.en: Inflation is rampant and industry in decline.
sentences.cn: 通胀势头严重，工业不断下滑。

sentences.en: Malaria is still rampant in some swampy regions.
sentences.cn: 疟疾在一些沼泽地区仍很猖獗.

sentences.en: Pickpocketing is rampant in the downtown area.
She alleged that there was rampant drug use among the male members of the group.
sentences.cn: 她声称该团体中有大量的男性成员吸毒。

sentences.en: Sickness was rampant in the area.
So that the savage we had tamed was still rampant in him.
sentences.cn: 因此,我们身上已经驯服了的野性在他身上却仍然难以控制.

sentences.en: That area is full of rampant lawlessness.
sentences.cn: 那个地区充斥着犯罪事件.

sentences.en: The clocks are set back and the forces of destruction are rampant down below.
sentences.cn: 时钟已经倒转了,下面的那段破坏力量已无法控制.

sentences.en: The rampant clapping has been broken out of people.
sentences.cn: 人们爆发了疯狂的掌声.

sentences.en: The savage we had tamed was still rampant in him.
sentences.cn: 我们身上已经驯服了的野性在他身上却仍然难以控制.

sentences.en: Thus, crime is common, apathy is de rigueur, and cynicism is rampant.
sentences.cn: 从而, 罪恶变得没什么大不了, 冷漠变成社交需要, 而玩世不恭成了每个人的生活态度.

sentences.en: Unemployment is now rampant in most of Europe.
sentences.cn: 在欧洲的大部分地区，失业问题难以控制。

sentences.en: You cannot allow children to rampant through the museum.
sentences.cn: 你不能任由小孩子在博物馆里乱跑.

words.tran_cn: 暴跳的，暴怒的；粗暴的，狂暴的
猖獗的；蔓延的；狂暴的；奔放的

trans.tran_cn: 蔓延的，猖獗的，（指动物）只用后腿站立的，（植物）疯长的
trans.tran_en: if something bad, such as crime or disease, is rampant, there is a lot of it and it is very difficult to control
